title: Quizzler
desc:
Post 1379
- Choose a player.
- Chosen player will draw 2 cards, but will not be informed why, and this card is never shown as being played, instead appearing as if you drew a card.
- If the player questions why, it is corrected. The card is shown to be played instead of you drawing a card, the card appears to be removed from your hand in info, (because it never was there), and they draw an extra three cards.
